The access code you have entered is not valid. Please contact your coordinator.
I do not want to participate

Karya Participation Consent Form

Thank you for your participation on the Karya platform. This document describes the goals of the platform and the various steps involved in your participation. You have no obligation to participate. You may end your participation at any time.

Purpose of the Platform

The goal of the platform is to offer paid digital work to various users. Through the Karya smartphone app, you can get access to simple tasks that can be completed on your smartphone. You will get paid for all the correctly completed tasks. The type of task assigned to you will depend on the specific study you are participating in. For instance, a task may require you to record yourself speaking out a sentence. Regardless, the Karya app will provide you clear instructions on how to complete each task in your regional language. The app will also inform you how much you will be paid if you complete the task correctly. You can withdraw from participation at any time, and you will be paid for the tasks you have completed till that point.

Procedure
  1. To begin, you will be introduced to the Project Coordinator for your location. This person will be your point of contact for help related to the project.
  2. Your project coordinator will provide you with instructions and if necessary, help you to download and install the “Karya” mobile application on your smartphone.
  3. Your project coordinator will give you an “Access Code”. You need to enter the code during the registration process. Each access code can be used only once. Therefore, do not share the access code with anyone else.
  4. The registration process may require you to sign-in with your phone number. This information will be used to identify you on the platform when you close the application and open it again.
  5. In addition, we will also collect some demographic information about you, e.g., your age range, gender, education level, etc.
  6. To receive tasks on our platform, the app must “sync” with our server. This operation will submit all the tasks you have completed on our platform to the server and receive any new tasks. After registration, the app will automatically sync with our server. You can trigger subsequent syncs by clicking on the sync button in the app.
  7. In the main app screen (dashboard), you will be presented with a list of different type of tasks assigned to you, along with information on each type of task: number of tasks assigned, number of tasks completed, number of tasks submitted, etc. For each type of task, the app will provide detailed instructions on how you must complete the task, and how much you will be paid if you complete the task correctly. Please pay attention to these instructions before proceeding with the tasks.
  8. At the end of your participation, we request you to delete the application from your phone. Should you want, your project coordinator will aid you in installing, configuring, and deleting the application.
  9. After the end of the study, we may request a short interview with you to gather your feedback and understand your experience of using our platform.
Risks and Benefits
  1. This platform only offers supplemental work. As a result, we have a limited number of tasks available. Do not let your participation in our platform interfere with your current work. Your participation will only require upto one to two hours of your time every day.
  2. We recommend doing the provided work in a patient manner. This will allow you to submit more accurate responses and will also make sure you don’t spend too much time on the smartphone. Spending too much time on a smartphone could be bad for your eyes and may affect your social life. We recommend not working for more than 2 hours a day.
  3. If we lend you a smartphone to participate (as part of a research study), we trust you to use the provided smartphone responsibly. If you have not used a smartphone before, it can be overwhelming. We are happy to help you in any and every way possible. You can contact us via your project coordinator.
Personal Information

Any personal information we collect during the study will only be used to identify you during the duration of the study. We will delete all personal information as soon as the study is over. We will not share your personal information with anyone. However, we may use pictures from the study in presentations or posters without identifying specific individuals. We will request your permission before taking pictures and obtain your permission to use those pictures in our presentations or posters. Not providing consent for taking pictures will not disqualify you from participating in the study. For additional information or concerns, please contact us through your project coordinator.

Payment for Participation

You will be paid for all correctly completed tasks on the platform. The app or your project coordinator will also provide you feedback on how well you are performing on the platform so that you can improve your responses for future tasks. We will work with you and your project coordinator to identify the best mode of payment. We will collect and store your payment information for the duration of the study. We will pay you periodically for all your tasks that have undergone quality verification. We will delete all payment information as soon as your participation is completed. Please contact your project coordinator if you have any queries regarding payments.

Dataset Collected from the Study

Depending on the source of the task, we will use the dataset collected as part of your responses for the task for various purposes including releasing them publicly for research purposes. For each task, we will explain to you the end use of the dataset via your project coordinator. Most datasets will contain only text or audio data that is not associated with personally identifiable information. In situations where a dataset does contain personally identifiable information (e.g., video), we will obtain explicit consent from you before providing such a task. If you have any questions regarding how the dataset will be used, please feel free to ask us through your project coordinator or using the email address provided below.

Contact Information

Should you have any questions about your participation, please contact us via email at thekaryainc+questions@gmail.com. In case you do not have access to email, you can contact your project coordinator, and have them relay your concerns.

Consent

By clicking “I agree” below, you confirm that the goals and the procedure for participation on the platform was explained to you, you had a chance to ask questions before beginning your participation, and all your questions were answered satisfactorily. By clicking “I agree” below, you voluntarily consent to participate, and you do not give up any legal rights you have as a study participant. On behalf of Karya Inc, we thank you for your contribution and look forward to your participation. Do you understand and consent to these terms?
To use Karya, you need to register with our application using your phone number. Please enter your phone number below.
We could not generate an OTP for this phone number. Please check the number or try again later.
The access code is already registered to a different phone number. Please contact the coordinator for a new access code.
We have sent a 6-digit OTP via SMS to 0000000000. Please enter the OTP below.
You have entered an invalid OTP.
You have completed tasks that can be submitted to the server. Do you want to submit the tasks now?
You can do this task only between _START_TIME_ and _END_TIME_.
Error while uploading files. Please contact your coordinator.
Error while sending tasks. Please contact your coordinator.
Error while receiving tasks. Please contact your coordinator.
Error while downloading files. Please contact your coordinator.
Error while receiving validations. Please contact your coordinator.

Type what you see in the image below
Take a picture of the front cover. Move to a random page. Take pictures of # continuous pages from the random page
Is the above sentence grammatically correct?
Are all the words spelt correctly in the sentence?

No boxes are drawn to the screen. Do you want to proceed?
